fullplot: A 15 year old Somalian boy meets a 40 year old Iranian man on a refugee camp in Skène, in the south of Sweden. With the threat of deportation hanging over them they decide to the take their faiths in their own hands and together they go on a journey in the Swedish summer.

title: The New Country
